PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must comply with ISO IEC 62304 Medical Device Data Systems standard on manufacturing of the assay and system.
NAATOS TB V1 must comply with IEC 61010 and 61326 or higher standards or regulations on electrical equipment for laboratory use.
SR Description: When the "power" switch is switched to off, the PM shall electrically disconnect the battery
The PM shall comply with IEC 61010-1
The PM shall comply with IEC 61010-2-101
The PM shall comply with IEC 61326-1
The PM shall comply with IEC 61326-2-6
When the "power" switch is switched to off, the SPM shall electrically disconnect the battery
The SPM shall comply with IEC 61010-1
The SPM shall comply with IEC 61010-2-101
The SPM shall comply with IEC 61326-1
The SPM shall comply with IEC 61326-2-6

PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must comply with ISO 18113-1 for labeling that provides necessary information for proper use, handling, and identification.
SR Description: The PM shall comply with ISO 18113-1 for labeling that provides necessary information for proper use, handling, and identification
The SPM shall comply with ISO 18113-1 for labeling that provides necessary information for proper use, handling, and identification

PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must be manufactured in a facility certified and authorized under ISO 13485 or certified under MDSAP.
NAATOS TB V1 must comply with ISO EN 13485 or higher standards or regulations on manufacturing of assay and system.
NAATOS TB V1 must be capable of meeting the performance criteria defined in WHO TSS-17.
